00003 PhysicWorld::PhysicWorld(const WorldInfo info)
00004 {
00005 
00006         m_collisionConfiguration = new btDefaultCollisionConfiguration();
00007         m_dispatcher = new btCollisionDispatcher(m_collisionConfiguration);
00008 
00009         m_overlappingPairCache = new btAxisSweep3(info.getMin()->toBtVector3(),info.getMax()->toBtVector3());
00010 
00011         #if SLIDER_DEMO_USE_ODE_SOLVER
00012         m_constraintSolver = new btOdeQuickstepConstraintSolver();
00013         #else
00014                 m_constraintSolver = new btSequentialImpulseConstraintSolver();
00015         #endif
00016         m_dynamicsWorld = new btDiscreteDynamicsWorld(m_dispatcher,m_overlappingPairCache,m_constraintSolver,m_collisionConfiguration);
00017         //      wp->getSolverInfo().m_numIterations = 20; // default is 10
00018         this->m_gravite = info.getGravity()->toBtVector3();
00019         m_dynamicsWorld->setGravity(this->m_gravite);
00020 }

00023 void PhysicWorld::setGravite(const btVector3& newGravite)
00024 {
00025         this->m_dynamicsWorld->setGravity(newGravite);
00026         this->m_gravite = newGravite;

00181                                         #endif
